title: Design Autonomous Robot Architecture
description: Create the blueprint for a robot capable of autonomously detecting and repairing damaged infrastructure.

title: Develop Autonomous Robot Detection System
description: Create the software that allows the robot to detect damaged infrastructure.

title: Develop Repair Mechanisms for the Robot
description: Program the robot to perform necessary repairs on damaged infrastructure.

title: Create Infrastructure Damage Detection Algorithm
description: Develop an algorithm that identifies damaged infrastructure.

title: Write User Manual for robotsRéparationAutonome
description: Create a user manual explaining how to operate and maintain the autonomous repair robots.

title: Perform Security Audit on robotsRéparationAutonome
description: Review the system for potential security vulnerabilities and suggest improvements.

title: Test and Validate the Functionality of robotsRéparationAutonome
description: Perform tests to ensure that the autonomous repair robots function as intended.
dependencies: Develop Repair Mechanisms for the Robot

title: Review and Approve Design of robotsRéparationAutonome
description: Review the design of the autonomous repair robot system and provide feedback.
